meanings: (떨어지지 않게) stick, attach, (formal) affix; (풀로) paste, glue
have no place to attach one's foot

vlive.korean: (금)손에 붙일 건데요? We'll put it on your hand. 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “셉카소를 찾아라” ① (힙합팀 : SEVENTEEN)
vlive.english: We'll put it on your hand.

vlive.korean: 의지가 있으면 붙일 수 있다고요? If I have the will, I can? 듣기 View video WOODZ (조승연) : 오늘도 들립니다.
vlive.english: If I have the will, I can?

vlive.korean: 아~ 바느질 안 하고 붙일 때? Instead of sewing? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.104
너 진짜로 저 코끼리 붙일 거야? put the elephant? 듣기 View video BLACKPINK : 꾸며봅시당🖤
근데 어디에 붙일 거야? Where are you going to put it? 듣기 View video BLACKPINK : 꾸며봅시당🖤
vlive.english: Where are you going to put it?

examples.korean: Surgeons were able to sew the finger back on. 발음듣기 (외과) 의사들이 그 손가락을 다시 꿰매 붙일[봉합할] 수가 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Surgeons were able to sew the finger back on. 발음

examples.korean: This function allows you to cut and paste text. 발음듣기 이 기능을 쓰면 텍스트를 오려 붙일 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This function allows you to cut and paste text. 발음

examples.korean: He came up to me and asked for a light. 발음듣기 그가 내게 다가오더니 (담배에 붙일) 불을 좀 빌리자고 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He came up to me and asked for a light. 발음

examples.korean: Been a long and tiring day. I am so ready for some shut eye. 발음듣기 길고 피곤한 하루였어. 눈 좀 붙일 준비 완료. DARAKWON
examples.english: Been a long and tiring day. I am so ready for some shut eye. 발음

examples.korean: He couldn't feel an attachment at all to city life. 발음듣기 그는 도시생활에는 전혀 마음을 붙일 수 없었다. 생활 표현 사전
examples.english: He couldn't feel an attachment at all to city life. 발음
